    /**
     * Show the form for creating a new resource.
     *
     * @param  @@requestClass@@  $request
     * @return \Illuminate\Http\Response
     */
    public function create(@@requestClass@@ $request)
    {
@@belongsToRelation@@
        return view('@@viewPath@@.create', [
            'model' => new @@modelName@@,
@@belongsToRelationVars@@
        ]);
    }
